answers.question: What can I do to protect myself from trafficking?
answers.answer: You can find out what to do to reduce your vulnerability to human trafficking on this page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and read the section under 'Human trafficking'.

answers.question: What should I do in an emergency?
answers.answer: There is a guide titled 'What to do in case of emergency or war,' created by Ukrainian authorities, which provides detailed instructions on how to prepare for and act during emergencies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and read the section under 'Guide for what to do in case of emergency or war'.
answers.read_instruction: read the section under 'Guide for what to do in case of emergency or war'.

answers.question: How can I find safe places in Romania?
answers.answer: You can find a list of shelters in Romania, including a specific list of shelters in Bucharest.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and read the section under 'Map of shelters in Romania'.
answers.read_instruction: read the section under 'Map of shelters in Romania'.

answers.question: What help is available for children?
answers.answer: You can learn more about child safety on this page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and read the page carefully.

answers.question: When should I report suspected trafficking?
answers.answer: You should report in case of suspicion of human trafficking, and you can find contacts for reporting on this page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and read the section under 'Human trafficking'.
